text: Dobrodiynistʹ bude poyikhaty do bidnyy khto strazhdayutʹ v im'ya BOHA, ta ne mozhe pereyizhdzhayutʹ. unaware mozhutʹ podumaty shcho vony musyatʹ bahata, yikhnya hidnistʹ. Ale vy mozhete vyznaty yikh pevnymy znakamy; vony nikoly ne prosyatʹ z lyudey napolehlyvo. Shchob ni dobrodiynistʹ vy dayete, BOH znaye tsilkom tut
